1.title: Sanyukta, Parth Recalls Old Days
1.plot: After 2 years Sanyukta is shown working for an IT firm where she meets Aryan. Aryan is a hacker who gradually falls for Sanyukta. Parth recovers from coma. They recall memories. At last he asks about Randhir to which Sanyukta is speechless.

imdb.plot outline: Sadda Haq is about a modern day girl Sanyukta who dreams of becoming an engineer and how she navigates her dream from her patriarchal set up at home to the engineering college, also known to be a man's domain. It's about her trials and tribulations in a mechanical engineering class.
imdb.title: Sadda Haq
plot: _Sadda Haq_ (qv) is about a modern day girl Sanyukta who dreams of becoming an engineer and how she navigates her dream from her patriarchal set up at home to the engineering college, also known to be a man's domain. It's about her trials and tribulations in a mechanical engineering class.::Times of India
